details: Chronic stiffness of the muscles. Gonorrheal rheumatism. Syphilis and rheumatism, great heat over body, much aching, better sweat. Pain in back of head and spine; band-like feeling around head. Pericarditis with rheumatism. Rheumatic pains in feet and lower part of legs. Urine contains uric acid.
name: Franciscea
dosage: Tincture or Fluid Extract 10 to 60 minims.
